title: Does One Month Of Training Really Make A Difference?

media:group.media:title: Does One Month Of Training Really Make A Difference?
media:group.media:description:
Cillian is our resident stat nerd, and whilst he's been very fit before, his love of stats has gotten in the way of his riding! That is until now, as we'd signed him up to the Zwift Academy, to see if he can bring back any of the form of his younger self, but just how much difference does a month of training make?
